column1:
share on x sg sakis gertsis. jun 22 at 1:27 am dear mrs. krieg, just learned about dr. krieg's passed away and i was shocked! he was like a father for me and i send to you and the family my warmest condolences from thessaloniki, greece! the least i can do at this moment! all his students remember him and consider him as our inspiration and as a "model" person and scientist! pls accept my sincere condolenses. i will try to conatct you in a few days! sincerely sakis gertsis. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x more memories... currently no events are scheduled. no medias to show. 365 days of grief support. subscribe facebook sanders funeral home website designed by funeralone contact obituaries about store
